content: build in an industry standard 19-inch frame and can be installed on a raised or non-raised floor. For more information about dimensions, weight and floor loading tables,3932 Single Frame Installation Manual for Physical Planning (Models A02/LA2), GC28-7040 on Resource Link. The Power and weight estimation tool for IBM Z servers, also available on Resource Link, can provide the estimated weight for any specific configuration. On the Resource Link website, click Tools → Power and weight estimation. 11.2.4 Physical planning This section describes the floor mounting, power, and I/O cabling options. For more information, see 3932 Single Frame Installation Manual for Physical Planning (Models A02/LA2), GC28-7040 on Resource Link. Raised floor or non-raised floor IBM z16 A02 can be installed on a raised or non-raised floor. The following options and features are available for I/O cabling and line cords:  Top Exit cabling without Tophat feature  Top Exit cabling with Tophat feature Chapter
